title: What causes opioid addiction, and why is it so tough to combat? - Mike Davis

multiple-choice.question: What ancient civilizations are known to have used opium for its medicinal and recreational properties?

options.label: B

options.text: They have a short duration of action

options.label: D
options.text: They are inexpensive and widely available

title: What is society? | US society for children

multiple-choice.question: What is a society?

options.label: B
options.text: A large group of people who share the same laws, rights, and resources

options.label: C
options.text: A community of people who only speak the same language

options.label: D
options.text: A group of people who only work in the same profession

multiple-choice.question: What is a key characteristic of people living in a society?

options.text: They must live close to one another

options.label: B
options.text: They must speak the same language

options.label: C
options.text: They can live far away from one another and still be part of the same community

options.label: D
options.text: They must work in the same profession

options.label: D

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: A group of friends who live in the same neighborhood

options.label: D

options.label: C

options.label: C

options.label: D
options.text: They must live in the same neighborhood

title: 6 ways to start a sentence | Sentence structure | Learn to write

multiple-choice.question: What is one of the best ways to start a sentence?

options.label: C
options.text: With the subject first and the verb second

multiple-choice.question: What is the function of a verb in a sentence?

options.label: A
options.text: To describe the location of the subject

options.label: B
options.text: To tell what the subject is doing

multiple-choice.question: Which of the following is an example of starting a sentence with words that tell you where something is happening?

options.label: A
options.text: After school, we played computer games.

options.label: B
options.text: On the beach, there was a shipwreck.

options.label: D
options.text: Who is the richest person in the world?

multiple-choice.question: What punctuation mark should be used when starting a sentence with words that tell you when something is happening?
What is the purpose of starting a sentence with a question?

options.label: D
options.text: To describe the location of the subject

multiple-choice.question: Which of the following is an example of starting a sentence with an action ending in -ing?

options.label: B
options.text: Looking at the clock, she realized she was going to be late.

options.label: C
options.text: Who is the richest person in the world?

options.label: D
options.text: After school, we played computer games.

options.text: Who is the richest person in the world?
